nodes.text: AS-B07 was a messenger droid. It resembled a small, floating black sphere, with a transmitter unit, and it could be used as a secure method for communicating information. One was given to the Heroes of Cularin by Culpharm, as a reward for the heroes rescuing some Culpharm scientists.
AS-B07 appears in Force Contention, if the player characters succeed in rescuing the Culpharm scientists.
